alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rankin and southeastern Hinds Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 345 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raymond, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Clinton, Pearl, Brandon, Byram, Flowood, Richland, Florence, Raymond, Terry, Learned, Dry Grove, Whites and Monterey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central Mississippi.
